title: Glen Appin Lovely Shower-Proof Poly Viscose Royal Stewart Tartan Dog Coat with Fleece Lining- Available in 3 Sizes, Large
features: Shower-proof, machine-washable Poly Viscose outer with fleece lining.

Small - Back Length 30cm - suitable for Jack Russell, Border Terrier, Pekingese or similar breed. Medium - Back Length 40cm - suitable for West Highland Terrier, Fox terrier, Cavalier King Charles Spaniel or similar breed. Large - Back Length 50cm - Suitable for Basset Hound, Boxer, Springer spaniel or similar breed.
